thread.section_title: Hotel Eiffel Segur - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Quick two-night stay
thread.title_full: Quick two-night stay - Review of Hotel Eiffel Segur, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jessa G
title: Quick two-night stay
text: Great location within a 15 minute walk of the Eiffel Tower. Reception was incredibly helpful - provided an umbrella on a particularly rainy day, and helped me get in contact with my airport shuttle service when it was late on departure. Exceptional bakery just minutes down the street was great for a quick breakfast. Very close to one of the main metro stations. Very cute room, that included a towel warmer which definitely came in handy!
